programme.title: Monsieur Dictionnaire
programme.desc: Jacques Mercier explains the origins or meanings behind a French word or expression to Philippe Geluck. For his part, the creator of the cartoon character "The Cat" goes out of his way to set cunning traps for his co-host, and adds his inimitable brand of humorous interjections throughout the programme. Presented by: Philippe Geluck, Jacques Mercier.

programme.title: Littoral
programme.desc: The curious tale of the customized lobster An immersive film that recounts the tortuous route taken to arrive at the point of revolutionising marine taxidermy. Backed by the owner of one of the most important collections of curiosities in the world, William Dubourg, taxidermist from Caen, is about to create customized crustaceans mounted in exploded format. Documentary by: Jackie Maugère. Presented by: Marine Barnérias.

programme.title: 5 chefs dans ma cuisine
programme.desc: Sauerkraut and kimchi Blake Mackay introduces us to the principles of fermentation and teaches us how to cook sauerkraut and kimchi. Presented by: Marina Orsini. Directed by: Nicole Dussault, David Gauthier, Stéphane Rocheleau, Léo Boulanger (Canada, 2020)

programme.title: Le court du jour : femmes de science
programme.desc: Who are the women in the world of science? What was it that pushed them to take an interest in nanowires, computer-aided molecular design or cryptography? Where did their vocation come from? Some of today's women scientists explain their whys and wherefores, in three minutes flat! Directed by: Alban Kakulya (Switzerland, 2019)

programme.title: De par chez nous
programme.desc: Community development The photographer Jamie Bard-Dubé, in Saint-André, New Brunswick, and Dominic Gagné, who runs the Haute-Gaspésie Youth Centre in Quebec, are both determined to make a difference to the lives of the children in their community. Presented by: Marième Ndiaye. Directed by: Julie Lambert, Catherine Leblanc (season 3, Canada, 2018)

programme.title: Boris Vian, un coeur qui battait trop fort
programme.desc:
He loved life and celebrated it every way he could: literature, music, song, poetry, painting, science... Boris Vian knew that his heart condition wouldn't allow him to grow old; he passed away on 23 June 1959, aged just 39. We look back at the incredible career of a gifted artist.

Directed by: Sylvain Bergère (France, 2020)

programme.title: Les petites bulles
programme.desc: Microscopic pond-life Small, microscopic, almost invisible, the water fleas, cyclops and mosquito larvae that live in ponds are all absolutely fascinating.

programme.title: Les contes de Lupin
programme.sub-title: Le capitaine et le coffre maudit

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : c'est dans la boîte !
programme.desc:
Rocky versus King Kong
King Kong, the giant gorilla, is an enormously successful film character first created in 1933 and now found in a whole range of films. So, who's the strongest: Rocky or King Kong?
Directed by: Angelo Abou Hatem (season 2, Belgium, 2021) With Aurélie Martinez and Romain Angeveld

programme.title: Meurtres à Amiens
programme.desc:
On a canal amidst the "hortillonnages", the floating market gardens of Amiens, a lifeless body is found in a Nautilus-shaped fun-fair gondola. Inspector Monet and his assistant Barnier head the investigation. The victim, a seemingly ordinary woman, was apparently threatened ambitious plans for a Jules Verne theme park.

Directed by: Vincent Trisolini (France, 2021)

Screenplay by: Natascha Cucheval, Cécile Lorne

Cast: Grégoire Bonnet (Monet), Joyce Bibring (Léa), Anne Loiret (Eléonore), Célia Rosich (Charlotte), Aladin Reibel (Jelenski), Janis Abrikh (Gaspard), Nicolas Grandhomme (Philippe), Xavier Robic (Jauffert), Anthony Goffi (Max), Julien Desjardins (Thomas), Pascal Casanova (Paul Chevrier)

Genre: thriller

programme.title: Tralala
programme.desc:
Tralala, a forty-something street busker in Paris, crosses the path of a young woman who leaves him with a cryptic message before disappearing: ''above all, don't be yourself''. Had he dreamed it? Tralala leaves the French capital and, in Lourdes, finally meets her again, the woman he already loves ...

Directed by: Jean-Marie Larrieu, Arnaud Larrieu (France, 2020)

Cast: Mathieu Amalric, Josiane Balasko, Mélanie Thierry, Maïwenn

Awards: Official selection (Cannes 2021)

Genre: Dramedy

programme.title: Prémonitions
programme.desc:
Episode 1:

The meeting Clara, clan chief, hasn't heard from her daughter Lili for a week and is worried about her. Is she in danger in the arms of a man she bewitched? Everyone hopes she'll be back in time to celebrate the birthday of Félicia, who has only just discovered her gift.

Directed by: Charles-Olivier Michaud (season 1, Canada, 2016)

Screenplay: Patrick Lowe, Estelle Bouchard, Charles-Olivier Michaud

Cast: Pascale Bussières (Clara Jacob), Sophie Desmarais (Liliane Jacob), Jade Charbonneau (Félicia Jacob), Mikhaïl Ahooja (Arnaud Jacob), Benoît Gouin (Jules Samson), Éric Bruneau (Pascal Deraspe), Liam Patenaude (Romain Jacib)

Genre: drama

Parental guidance: TV-PG

programme.title: Prémonitions
programme.desc:
Episode 2:

Runaway Following tragedy, the Jacob family hides out with Arnaud. Félicia is still unconscious. Lili is worried. Meanwhile, Arnaud and Clara erase all signs of what happened the day before with Pascal.

Directed by: Charles-Olivier Michaud (season 1, Canada, 2016)

Screenplay: Patrick Lowe, Estelle Bouchard, Charles-Olivier Michaud

Cast: Pascale Bussières (Clara Jacob), Sophie Desmarais (Liliane Jacob), Jade Charbonneau (Félicia Jacob), Mikhaïl Ahooja (Arnaud Jacob), Benoît Gouin (Jules Samson), Éric Bruneau (Pascal Deraspe), Liam Patenaude (Romain Jacib)

Genre: drama

Parental guidance: TV-PG

programme.title: OPJ Pacifique Sud
programme.desc: Episode 19: Robinson and life in the wilderness (1) A coffin marked with Clarissa's name is left in front of the police station. Kelly also receives a macabre message: Robinson, a hermit who lives apart from his tribe, is going to die. As Jackson and Kelly meet a Robinson in perfect health, Kelly's cousin disappears... Directed by: Matthieu Vollaire (season 1, France, 2019) Cast: Yaëlle Trulès (Clarissa Hoarau), Antoine Stip (Gaspard Watson), Nathan Dellemme (Jackson Bellerose), Marielle Karabeu (Kelly Kwaté), Hindra Armede (Agathe Hoarau), Clémentine Julienne (Joséphine Fleury), Julia Paul (Manon Lambert), Alexandre Varga (Raphaël Mayer) Genre: detective

programme.title: OPJ Pacifique Sud
programme.desc: Episode 20: Robinson and life in the wilderness (2) The investigators take advantage of a hold-up to set a trap for the person who kidnapped Kelly's cousin. A particularly tricky mission. As Jackson and Gaspard are about to lose their friend, Clarissa has a confrontation with Raphaël that's full of surprises... Directed by: Matthieu Vollaire (season 1, France, 2019) Cast: Yaëlle Trulès (Clarissa Hoarau), Antoine Stip (Gaspard Watson), Nathan Dellemme (Jackson Bellerose), Marielle Karabeu (Kelly Kwaté), Hindra Armede (Agathe Hoarau), Clémentine Julienne (Joséphine Fleury), Julia Paul (Manon Lambert), Alexandre Varga (Raphaël Mayer) Genre: detective

programme.title: Destinations
programme.desc: The Corsica of Guy de Maupassant With its villages clinging to vertiginous hillsides and its nature in a thousand different colours, Corsica dazzled Guy de Maupassant. After his first literary successes, Corsica appeared to the young Maupassant as the most exotic of destinations: totally wild. An island that inspired several of his short stories.

programme.title: Magaluf : ville fantôme(s)
programme.desc:
The seaside town of Magaluf in Majorca, so calm and peaceful in winter, turns into a living hell in summer. Binge drinking, sex and fighting in the streets are the norm for holidaymakers and locals. And it is far from being the only seaside town where this is happening.

Director: Miguel Ángel Blanca Pachón (France, 2021)

programme.title: Un si grand soleil
programme.desc: Épisode 339 Alors que la vérité sur le meurtre de Perrine éclate enfin au grand jour, la police s'intéresse aux activités de Gimenez en prison. De son côté, Christophe vit un véritable cauchemar... Réalisation : Jérôme Portheault, Marion Lallier, Yannick Saillet, David Durca (saison 2, France, 2019) Distribution : Chrystelle Labaude (Élizabeth), Moïse Santamaria (Manu), Mélanie Robert (Manon), Naïma Rodric (Lucille), Aïssam Medhem (Akim), Shirley Bousquet (Laëtitia), Léonie Dahan-Lamort (Camille), Hubert Benhamdine (Christophe), Mathilde Jaillette (Johanna), Folco Marchi (Ludo), Benjamin Bourgois (Alex), Mélanie Maudran (Claire), Maëlle Mietton (Alice), Jérémy Banster (Julien) Genre : comédie dramatique

programme.title: Merci professeur !
programme.desc: A short review of the French language, its quirks, accents and news. Presented by: Bernard Cerquiglini.

programme.title: Shamengo, les pionniers du nouveau monde
TV5MONDE, le journal Afrique
programme.desc: All the African news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Pièces secrètes - Un tour du monde des collectionneurs
programme.desc: Laurent Dassault meets the world's biggest art collectors and invites them to unveil the "secret garden" of their collections and to explain what they love so much about these special works of art. Presentation: Laurent Dassault.
